name: Shubman Gill
reason: Knows this pitch like his own backyard. Handles both spin and pace with poise.

name: KL Rahul
reason: Safe anchor, can give a solid start and usually plays deep

name: Karun Nair
reason: A bit of a punt pick, but if he gets time at the crease, can turn it on.

name: Sai Sudharsan
reason: Plays spin and pace well, rotates strike, smart player on big grounds.
